name: UoH-IOC Artificial Intelligence Skills Bootcamp
description: This digital badge confirms successful completion of the 16 week UOH-IOC AI Skills Bootcamp in March 2022. Topics studied included algorithms, python programming, machine learning, data preparation, feature extraction, language processing. Applications included creating a spam filter and a chat bot, using machine learning for inventory control and robotics for warehousing. The course began on the 8th of November and ended on the 31st of March.

alignment.targetDescription: Level 4 of the Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) for general and vocational qualifications regulated by Ofqual in England and the Council for the Curriculum, Examinations and Assessment (CCEA) in Northern Ireland
Institute of Coding recognition of completion

criteria.narrative: This digital badge confirms successful completion of the Artificial Intelligence Skills Bootcamp, in which learners demonstrated competence in the following skills: Computational thinking, Python programming, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning, Automation, Self-directed development in application of skills to real-world examples (spam filter, chat bot, inventory control, robotics) and in preparation for associated careers (careers planning, self-reflection, independent learning, CV development). Students completed 10 hours of online classes and 20 hours of independent study to earn this badge.
